titles: A modest plea both for the caveat, and the author of it with some notes upon Mr. James Howell, and his sober inspections / by Roger L'Estrange.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
keywords: Howell, James, 1594?-1666. --  Some sober inspections made into those ingredients that went to the composition of a late cordial call'd A cordial for the Cavaliers.
